metadata.title: CVE-2016-6710 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the download manager in Android5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, 6.x before 2016-11-01, and 7.0before 2016-11-01 could enable a local malicious application to bypassoperating system protections that isolate application data from otherapplications. This issue is rated as High because it could be used to gainaccess to data that the application does not have access to. Android ID:A-30537115.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
